attributes.action: To keep transplants up and running through this pandemic!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.background: To keep transplants up and running because its a life saving treatment what people really need and they rely on to get better an live

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or House is directly responsible for, and NHS Blood and Transplant is operationally independent.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ensure speedy access to diagnostics and treatment for non-covid patients: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549642
